titleStmt.title: A letter from a gentleman in Germany, touching the discovery of a stange murder committed there, by a person of quality, upon a lustfull fryer: for endeavouring to corrupt his lady. Being a translation.
titleStmt.author: Vandenberg, Abraham.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by G.C. for the author,

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Abraham Vandenberg. September the 11th. 1684.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
